Nice local place, food is good, but the prices are in the high side.
Wow, just wow everything was amazing!
Place is lovely! Service was great and the food was delicious.  Im still stuffed hours later haha.

What a surprise! We got to Mama Pisco by chance. We were in the area and hungry and found this restaurant on Google. The satff was very friendly. The recommendation for apptizer was spot in. A delicious salmon tiradito with a passion fruit sauce. We also got a delicious octopus a la plancha, fried calamari and a super generous portion of a mixed seafood ceviche. The drinks , a passion fruit Pisco sour and a mescalita were spot on. The ambience is very lively. We will definitely be back.
Com√≠ causa de camarones, estuvo bien agradable y se sent√≠a los camarones deliciosos. Orden√© chicha y si est√° bien hecha de ma√≠z
Lomo saltado estaba delicioso, agradable y tuvo buena presentacion
Entra√±a a la parrilla estuvo requisimo, jugoso y con mucho sabor

Called at 10:45 on a Saturday night and asked if I could make a pick up order, instead of politely telling me their kitchen is closed they simply hung up on me. The hours say the kitchen closes at 11pm üëéüëéüëé
Ordenamos la causa acevichada, lomo con taller in verde, y lomo saltado - todo riqu√≠simo. Porciones muy buenas tambi√©n. De hecho que regresar√©!

This place never disappoints!! everything is fresh and full of flavor. This weekend they had a special dish called Tiradito de Salmon, and it was absolutely amazing!  definitely a 5-star plate! Highly recommend everyone to go and try it!
La comida, la atenci√≥n, el ambiente, todo nos encant√≥. Yajaira nos atendi√≥, estuvo s√∫per pendiente de todo y fue muy amable con nosotros. 10/10 recomendado
The food was amazing and yahaira service was awesome.

Very nice atmosphere. We ordered the anticuchos as starters and it was pretty good!. I ordered the ceviche as my main and it was 10/10 the fish felt fresh and perfect flavor and spice. My mom ordered the lomo saltado but it wasnt that great. It was a big good portion but i felt like the flavor was missing something not sure what also the steak was not as soft as other places I have tried but not terrible.

Siempre visito este restaurante el servicio excelente y la comida deliciosa, recomendado siempre, agradecida con Viviana y Elizabeth por el su buen servicio, si tienen antojo de comida peruana no duden en venir
The food was delicious! We ordered choros, ceviche de pescado, Chaufa de Res, tres leches, and chicha morada. The service was great, and the food was on point. I highly recommend this restaurant!
Great experience with the service of Viviana and great food!
The food was delicious and Paola was very welcoming and nice!! Will def come back .
Excelente opci√≥n, Isaac fue muy amable y atento

my husband and I came here for lunch and had the great luck of being served by Issac! he was attentive, kind, and overall made our experience wonderful! would highly recommend mama pisco for both the service and the incredible food! the steak pesto pasta is to die for! ask for Issac!
It was a great experience. The food was delicious and the service from Vivi was amazing. I will definitely come back for a second time.
Primera vez en este restaurante y me pareci√≥ fabuloso! Me encant√≥ la comida y la atenci√≥n de la se√±orita Viviana! Definitivamente vamos a regresar ! Me encant√≥ el ceviche y la Jalea!
great food and the service its the best üëç
Going to Mama Pisco is like taking a trip to Peru for a weekend, with good food and good service Viviana ,Paola and the chef best
Food was üî• asked the waiter Issac what he recommended and he told us the skirt steak and beef heart(dont knock it till you try it) and it was phenomenal! Even the moscow mule was on point!
I live in the neighborhood and this is by far one of hidden gems of Maspeth. Always amazing staff (especially Isaac) and consistently amazing food! Will always recommend.
Had a lovely time, food was delicious, service was wonderful, will be coming back!
Fabulous food, an authentic Peruvian experience, planning on coming back to enjoy the food
Exelente servicio

Great experience and food atmosphere was nice
The food is very good and flavorful. Steaks are done perfectly.

El especial fue fantastico!!!!

La experiencia en Mama Pisco fue realmente hermosa. Desde que llegamos nos sentimos como en casa. La comida estuvo deliciosa, con esos sabores peruanos aut√©nticos que te hacen viajar directo al coraz√≥n de Per√∫.
Queremos agradecer especialmente a Yahaira, quien nos atendi√≥ con tanta paciencia, cari√±o y una sonrisa que hizo que la tarde fuera a√∫n m√°s especial. No solo disfrutamos de la comida, tambi√©n del calor humano y la alegr√≠a con la que nos recibieron.
Definitivamente un lugar al que volver√≠amos mil veces, porque aqu√≠ no solo se come rico‚Ä¶ aqu√≠ se siente amor. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Ese arroz no se come, se celebra. Ahumadito, sabros√≥n, con ese sabor que te hace mirar pa‚Äôl cielo y dar gracias. El pisco sour‚Ä¶ uff, peligroso. Suavecito, entra f√°cil y te pone sabros√≥n sin darte cuenta

Acabo de salir de este sitio y fue incre√≠ble, yahaira e Isaac excelente servicio, el pisco sour 10/10 el bartender excelente, el estuvimos celebrando un cumplea√±os y la canci√≥n de cumplea√±os junto con las burbujas y toda la celebraci√≥n me encant√≥, lugar s√∫per recomendado!!!! Vendr√≠a mil veces m√°s

We came to celebrate my mom‚Äôs birthday and everything was amazing! The food was absolutely delicious, and the service from Yahaira and Isaac was outstanding‚Äîthey were so friendly and really made our lunch extra special. The surprise celebration cake was such a fun touch, we loved it! Highly recommend this place for any celebration or just a great meal.

Food was excellent !! We had a great time eating with the family! Our waiter, Issac was super amicable and took care of us. The service was impeccable. I‚Äôm think we bring my mom here for her birthday since she‚Äôs a Peruvian food connoisseur. Would totally come back!
Great food and  warm service.  The restaurant staff took great care of us and helped us made our mother feel loved in her special day!
Excelente ambiente, buena comida y excelente servicio
Elizabeth & Isaac ‚Äúexcelente atenci√≥n‚Äù muchas gracias

Todo los platos muy deliciosos.
Fui por una jalea mixta , causa de maricos y anticuchos y por el plato de la semana SOL ANDINO. Me encanto.‚Ä¶

Mama Pisco introduces you to Peruvian flavors in a stylish yet casual setting. While the d√©cor had potential for a cozy dining experience, the atmosphere during our visit was unexpectedly disruptive. There was noticeable noise from vacuuming and rearranging furniture mid-service, which made it difficult to fully enjoy the meal. It gave the impression that the space wasn‚Äôt quite prepped before guests arrived.

üçΩÔ∏è Food & Drinks
This was my first time trying Peruvian cuisine, and I was genuinely impressed. The seafood dish with rice was incredibly flavorful ‚Äî rich, savory, and portioned just right. They start you off with a bowl of crunchy dried corn, which was unexpected but a nice traditional touch. The overall quality of the food made a lasting impression and left me curious to try more from their menu.

üë®‚Äçüç≥ Service & Hospitality
Service, unfortunately, didn‚Äôt match the caliber of the food. While our server covered the basics, the overall attentiveness and engagement felt minimal. There was a lack of warmth or hospitality that could‚Äôve elevated the experience, especially for guests new to the cuisine.

Fui a Mama Pisco y la experiencia fue excelente. Mi mesera, Yahaira, fue muy atenta y amable durante todo el servicio. Ped√≠ un lomo saltado que lleg√≥ en su punto, con un sabor aut√©ntico y porci√≥n generosa. Para acompa√±ar, prob√© un pisco cl√°sico, fresco y balanceado, ideal para resaltar la comida. Sin duda, un lugar recomendable para disfrutar de la gastronom√≠a peruana.

The place is charming and really elegant. The service is nice and not on top of you, but they're there when you need something, I always find that great. The food is amazing delicious, and the preparation is beautiful. This was my first time but I promise you it  will not be my last time. I must add that the drinks are spectacular,

I have zero complaints about this place. I‚Äôve been here a few times now and every time has been amazing. Got the Frozen Pina Colada, Ceviche, Fried Rice, Steak, and we always get extra green sauce!
This place is worth the visit. The waitresses speak minimal english so keep that in mind but it doesn‚Äôt stop them from serving you so well. And the food is to die for. My husband and I crave this place week after week.

Came here to celebrate a birthday and everything was amazing! Highly recommend the Tallarines Verdes with skirt steak. The pesto pasta is so tasty and creamy. Their drinks are high quality and were only $10 during the happy hour! Issac and Elizabeth so kind and accommodating. Best servers out there !! Thank you to the team for making it such a special night for us ‚ù§Ô∏è

Great experience. Came for dinner and even though we didn‚Äôt have a reservation and it was full the service was amazing. Issac and Elizabeth were amazing, took really good care of us. The food was great and the environment as well.

The restaurant's ambiance is cozy and intimate
The food was absolutely amazing
Our waiter Ellie was very knowledgeable about the menu and made excellent recommendations. They were attentive without being intrusive.
The manager Tito  definitely  maintain the highest standard in managing the team and serving guests.
overall :
Everything was perfect! The food, the service, the ambiance ‚Äì all top-notch

La leche de tigre DELICIOSA, quiz√°s como sugerencia un camar√≥n m√°s en la copa, pero muy rica. La persona que nos atendi√≥ s√∫per atenta, amigable, lo √∫nico fue que no me ofreci√≥ el plan del d√≠a de 1 aperitivo y 2 platos por 50usd y  Todos los d√≠as tienen unas promociones pregunten.

Me hab√≠an recomendado este restaurante por mucho tiempo y finalmente me anim√© a visitarlo por motivo del d√≠a del padre.
La verdad es que no me arrepiento, la comida g el servicio son top!
Viviana nos atendi√≥ s√∫per bien, muy amable y agradable.
Pedimos jalea ( muy rica ) , leche de tigre, arroz con pollo y aj√≠ de gallina.
Los tragos tambi√©n muy bien hechos.
Definitivamente volveremos para otra celebraci√≥n!!

This is hands down one of my favorite spots for Peruvian food‚Äîauthentic, flavorful, and consistently top-notch. The cuisine is always on point and never disappoints. We‚Äôve tried almost everything on the menu, and every dish has been a hit. Solid 10/10‚Äîhighly recommend!

For drinks, their homemade sangria and classic pisco sour are must-haves‚Äîexpertly made and the perfect complement to the food.

The only downside was the margarita. The flavor was unbalanced, and the alcohol came through too strongly. Even after they kindly remade it twice, it still didn‚Äôt meet expectations. That said, everything else was truly outstanding, and I‚Äôll definitely keep coming back!
We come here for every birthday celebration. We love this place. Very authentic and really nice staff. I hope they never change! Thank you to Isaac and Elizabeth!!

sinceramente tenia muchas expectativas x los comentarios favorables sobre todo en el sabor de comida pero fue una decepcion completamente nada que ver con la comida peruana, probe la causa la consistencia del pollo dura y ligosa muy basica 5/10  el ceviche tenia una acidez amarga  como si hubiesen apretado el limon demasiado o  usado algun quimico  fuera de que el pescado de tilapia se sentia gaseoso en el paladar faltaba sal  2/10 no comi mas de 2 cucharas, el arroz de marisco nada que ver parecia un risoto con salsa de tomate  el verdadero arroz de marisco lleva salsa de ajies panca y salsa madre especial pero eso sabia a la salsa de tallarines rojos se sentia el sabor a puro tomate que no tendria que ver con un arroz de marisco sin considerar que era muy pobre en mariscos 5/10
El ambiente a primera impresion es acogedora pero uno va por la comida, soy peruana he tenido una cevicheria en Per√∫ me considero amante de la comida marina y me parece que le falta mucho en sazon mi familia tmb peruanos se pidieron aji de gallina, lomo saltado, papa a la huancaina, jalea nadie quedo contento  con su comida lo unico rescatable fue la jalea que tmb la probe y eso de que te pongan el 18% de propina en la cuenta casi 50$....de verdad nos fuimos descontentos.
Good vibes at this amazing restaurant in the Maspeth neighborhood.   Nice portion with their ceviche.   Food very seasoned and very good service.  The only drawbacks if parking

I came here to celebrate my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday with his family, and everything was exceptional. The food was absolutely delicious. Having been to Peru myself, I can confidently say it was just as incredible as the cuisine I enjoyed there. This is easily one of the best restaurants I‚Äôve tried in NYC. The live mariachi band added a beautiful and festive touch to the evening, and the service was outstanding, friendly, attentive, and welcoming. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!
Deliciosa comida peruana, la mesera Yajaira es muy agradable, se acomod√≥ a nuestros tiempos para que la comida est√© servida fresca. Siempre volvemos a este lugar, es genial!

DELICIOSO!!! todo lo que pruebes del men√∫ puedo asegurarte que no se van a decepcionar
El ambiente perfecto, buena m√∫sica el servicio 10/10   Recomendado  con los ojos cerrados
Pregunte por Viviana es s√∫per atenta a cada detalle üòå

Amazing Peruvian spot! The tallarines verdes were cooked perfectly, with a rich, fresh basil-spinach sauce full of flavor. The servers are very kind, the portions are generous, and the taste is authentically delicious, I‚Äôll definitely be back.
La comida es muy buena, todo est√° rico es la cuarta ves que voy y todas las veces la he pasado bien el ambiente es muy agradable pas√© mi cumplea√±os ah√≠, los meseros son s√∫per amables.
Great spot for food and drinks, and the service was great! They also play good music, and the atmosphere is lively!

My to go place for Peruvian food.
The food, the music, the servers and the drinks are fantastic! I‚Äôve tried every single dish from the menu and never disappoints ü´∂ü´∂100% recommended.
Food and service was amazing. Food was delicious and fresh. Service was great also. 100% recomendable. Isaac and Elizabeth were so nice and their service was great also

While eating I found a receipt in the middle of my fries all the way at the bottom. Literally an old receipt of another table & it looks a bit cooked‚Ä¶. It was a huge turn off. Especially since they have an A rating from the health inspector.  When I explained they would not take it off the bill since I didn‚Äôt say it from the jump? I didn‚Äôt really think too much of it but after hearing one of the servers say it was fine I was distraught with shock. They offered me food as a courtesy but after my experience i‚Äôd rather eat the receipt than try the food again.

Es la tercera  vez que visitamos este restaurante y siempre es la Mejor eleccion, todos los Platos son especiales, la calidad es exelente y el servicio.
Todo es exelente
The steak was so good. Isaac and Elizabeth were fast and kind. Stefania made an amazing pisco sunrise.

I'd give this place 6 stars for service if I could. Our server was extremely helpful, attentive, and friendly. She told us about a special we were not aware of and made awesome recommendations. The food was good, although the steak was so what chewy. I was fine with it but my wife took issue. It could have been a bad cut. The atmosphere was pleasant, and the music was not too loud but could have been a bit lower. We were seated right away and didn't have to wait long for anything. Will go back again.

**Review: Excellent Food, Great Atmosphere, and Fantastic Karaoke**

I recently visited this place, and I had an incredible experience. The food was excellent, with a variety of delicious dishes that left me wanting more. The atmosphere was lively and welcoming, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy a good meal.

One of the highlights was the karaoke. It was fantastic! The setup was great, and everyone was having a blast. The energy in the room was contagious, and it really added to the overall fun of the evening.

I highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for a great time with excellent food, a vibrant atmosphere, and fantastic karaoke. You won't be disappointed!

My family friends and I dined at Mama Pisco last week, and we had such a great time! Despite it being a Thursday, we were delighted by the surprise of a live mariachi band playing excellent music. The band encouraged everyone in the restaurant to request songs, creating a friendly and family-oriented atmosphere.

Our server for the evening, Elizabeth, was incredibly friendly and attentive. The business is owned by various partners, and Tito, one of them, was kind enough to bid us farewell as we were leaving. The entire team was very welcoming, and I cannot thank this place enough for the pleasant experience.

Mama Pisco also has a fantastic selection of cocktail drinks. I tried the passion fruit Margarita, and it was amazing! The food was great too, with well-portioned dishes at reasonable prices. I particularly loved the Chaufa with steak, but you can definitely order to your own preference. They also offer a wide variety of plates, including many vegetarian options.

Thank you again to everyone at Mama Pisco for the great time. I will definitely recommend this place to everyone and will be back again!

Mi lugar preferido para compartir, hoy me sorprendieron con un delicioso c√≥ctelü•∞
Me encanta su servicio me hace sentir como en casa.
The ‚ÄúLeche de Tigre‚Äù was excellent. Good service, very friendly, good drinks. All you can ask. Recommended.

I was at Mama Pisco today, and I can only say that the service is excellent. The food is delicious, and the presentation is the best. Our waiter, Andres, was always attentive if we needed anything. The atmosphere of the place is excellent, and the Latin music made me remember beautiful moments in my country. I recommend this place. üëèüëè
Had a wonderful time at mama pisco! The pulpo was my favorite. The chicken is amazing and the service is spectacular üòä
My steak was very well seasoned. Steak was juicy and melts in your mouth. The potions are OK for their prices, but the taste of the food makes up for it. Would recommend to family and friends.
Gotta say very nice experience  loved the food

Great place for a meal in the neighborhood. Service is great, very kind and plesant girls. I was worried that the music would be loud, but it wasn't. You could hold a conversation, but also it could be a litlle bit lower. To be honest i don't get why this place need a DJ. Food was very good and it was ready very quick. Next time we will be back for sea food menu because now we only tried steak and it was very tasty.
Me gust√≥ algunos de los platos que hemos consumido pero el ceviche no fue de mi preferencia siento que estaba muy cocido el pescado .
